segments.text: The idea about Friday the Thirteenth is totally ridiculous . I don't believe it at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe you can't be so sure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ? The whole idea is superstitious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But some people use this occasion to create trouble . Have you heard of the Black Friday Virus on the computer ? It is designed to break out on every Friday the Thirteenth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know that . But that has nothing to do with being unlucky . Those who created the virus are deliberately making fun of people .
segments.speaker: S1
